fullText: Nearly 45 years ago, I saw a performance of Stephen Sondheim and George Furth’s musical “Company.” The show had just opened and the theatergoers at my particular performance were more than a little confused and exasperated at this tendency the characters had for repeatedly showing up at the same birthday party.
textIssues: Show title not found in text
rejectionReasoning: claude: This appears to be the opening anecdotal setup of a review, not evaluative content about the current Broadway production; openai: The text is an anecdote about a past experience with the show 'Company' and does not provide any evaluative content about the current Broadway production.; gemini: This is an anecdote about seeing a previous production of Company, not a review of the current Broadway run.; kimi: The text describes a performance of 'Company' from 'nearly 45 years ago' when the show 'had just opened' (the 1970 original production), not a current Broadway revival. It contains no evaluation of any current Broadway production.
